publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-121 Mr Tom McCabe: Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing)(Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing)(Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr John Home Robertson*

S2M-121 Mr Tom McCabe: Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing)(Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr John Home Robertson

S2M-121 Mr Tom McCabe: Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing)(Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr John Home Robertson
